message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at a fair price. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $14,000 is really the lowest I'm willing to go.  I know it's a valuable product that will benefit you greatly.
I understand your position, Alice. However, given my financial situation, I am unable to meet your asking price of $14,000. I would like to propose one last counteroffer of $13,500 for the product.
